title: Barnsley want to sign Oxford goalkeeper Simon Eastwood
description: Barnsley are showing serious interest in Oxford goalkeeper Simon Eastwood, Sky Sports News understands.
content: The Tykes are keen to strengthen their goalkeeping unit this month and provide further competition for vice-captain Adam Davies and Nick Townsend.Eastwood has had an excellent season so far at Oxford, keeping nine clean sheets in 32 appearances.He joined Oxford on a free transfer from Blackburn in 2016 and has made over 100 appearances for the League One club.Should he move this month it will be the first time the 28-year-old has done so for a transfer fee. After spending time in non-league football following release by Huddersfield as a trainee, Eastwood played for Bradford City.He spent the 2010-11 season at Oxford but did not make an appearance before spells with Halifax and Portsmouth.
